title: Women representation in the literature department
summary: This chart shows the percentage of Women represented in the Literature Department .

\\n From the chart we see that Women are most represented in Engineering at 70 percentage , followed by Computer_Science at 60 percentage , Mathematics at 55 percentage , Arts at 32 percentage and \\n least represented is Literature at 24 percentage .
gold: The following graph show the percentage representation of women in the literature department . Engineering has the most representation at 70 % . Literature has the lowest percent representation at 22 % .
